name: cardid

stmt.origin: mp2b(wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
stmt.pretty: mp2b((card ` c0)[≅]c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ dom(card))

body.origin:
|- wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (card ` c0)[≅]c0
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(card)→(card ` c0)[≅]c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (card ` c0)[≅]c0
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(card)→(card ` c0)[≅]c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cfv(ccrd, c0), cen, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: Any set is equinumerous to its cardinal number. Proposition 10.5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 85. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
